pageProduct.name: Wanderlust Wander Glow 30 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

With plant derived nutrients to support collagen formation, skin elasticity, healthy hair and strong nails.

Wanderlust Wander Glow is a consciously created blend of plant actives. Plant derived vitamin C from Amla supports collagen formation, skin elasticity, skin firmness and wound healing. Silica derived from Bamboo and zinc derived from Guava supports healthy hair and strong nails.

Size: 30 Capsules

Warnings

If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional. Vitamin and mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet.

Ingredients

EACH CAPSULE CONTAINS:
Phyllanthus emblica (Organic Amla) fruit ext. dry conc. std 250 mg
Derived from min.dry----------8.75g
Equiv, ascorbic acid (Vitamin C)--------50 mg
Bambusa textilis (Bamboo) stem ext. dry conc. std. 100 mg
Derived from min.dry-----------9 g
Equiv. silicon dioxide----------50mg
Psidium guajava (Organic Guava) leaf ext. dry conc. std, 150 mg
Derived from min.dry-----------1.2 g
Equiv.zinc-------------6mg
Calendula officinalis (Calendula) flower ext. dry conc. 100 mg
Derived from dry------------1g
Taraxacum offfcinale (Dandelion) root ext. dry conc. 100 mg
Derived from dry-----------500 mg

No added gluten, dairy, lactose, soy, egg, artificial colours or artificial flavours. Suitable for vegetarians and vegans.

Directions

DIRECTIONS FOR USE - ADULT DOSAGE:
Take one capsule daily with a main meal, or as directed by your healthcare practitioner.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C in a cool, dry place. Do not use if cap seal or inner seal is missing or broken.
